attributes.action: Spouse visa rules change from 29 thousand per year to 20 thousand per year.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is very similar to yours: 

Reverse increase of the UK partner visa income from £18,600 to £29,000 if in UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737601
